channel.title: Offering gold crown for anyone that can help me get my server running!
channel.description: I have a server scaperune99 ive tried all the IP's you can imagine but none work.If u can get one to work I will give you a gold crown!!

item.title: Offering gold crown for anyone that can help me get my server running!
item.dc:creator: @rarescape rarescape
item.description:
@rarescape wrote:

[quote=“abignoob, post:8, topic:34499”]lol i wanted a no0ip server but i have trouble port forawding

(lost manual) something im nto proud of lol[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 09:18:04 PM[/size][hr]so bacily wat your saying is that even if i wanna make a ham server i still need to register for a no-ip.duc??[/quote]

NO, you don’t hafto have a NO-IP.DUC account to run a Hamachi server.

Franko23:

dude…slatman06 your gay.you don’t, maybe your client’s port is wrong, try changing the port if it doesn’t work…your computers made outa crap

SHUT UP!!!SLATMAN06 DIDN’T EVEN SAY ANYTHING WITH ANY OF THOSE WORDS IN IT!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Offering gold crown for anyone that can help me get my server running!
item.dc:creator: @Rpapa1 Rpapa1
item.description:
@Rpapa1 wrote:

Actually, If you don’t have NO-IP DUC, then you can’t have a server up and running correctly. Also, you will need to double-click on Runserver.bat/rar. You also might want to have a No-Ip server. You once you double click Runserver.bat/rar, you will see "Starting up server YOURSERVERNAME:SERVERPORT. Hope this helps you out! Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 09:16:14 PM[/size][hr][quote=“abignoob, post:6, topic:34499”]TRY MAKING TI AS A HAMACHI SERVER THAT HELPS SOME TIMES JUST GO TO hamachi.cc and downloan hamachi once u have it

create a network get people to join it open up complie.bat and open moparscape and type in your i.p and pass and watever lol and i think your in

(note this is just a guess of how u get your server ulp i am trying to make one but are having trouble portforwarding lol) :D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 09:13:18 PM[/size][hr]for the compile thing make sure that black box is open[/quote]
You don’t have to port forward. You can open up Runserver.bat/rar and your server will be up and running. Hope this helps you out! Thanks.

Read full topic
